description: A luxurious beachfront resort with ocean views and private villas.
features: Oceanfront, Private Pool, Spa, Fine Dining
best_customer_review: The private villa was stunning, and the view of the sunset was unforgettable!
worst_customer_review: Check-in took too long and the Wi-Fi was unreliable.

description: Rustic lodge nestled in the Rockies, ideal for nature lovers.
features: Fireplace, Hiking Trails, Ski-In/Ski-Out, Hot Tub
best_customer_review: Perfect winter getaway with cozy rooms and amazing trails.
worst_customer_review: Room heating was inconsistent during our stay.

description: Modern boutique hotel in the heart of the city with rooftop views.
features: Rooftop Bar, Free Wi-Fi, Gym, Art Gallery
best_customer_review: Loved the vibe and the rooftop bar was amazing!

description: Historic hotel offering royal treatment in a palatial setting.
features: Heritage Suites, Garden Restaurant, Cultural Events
best_customer_review: Felt like royalty! Truly a unique experience.
worst_customer_review: The AC was a bit noisy at night.

description: Eco-friendly resort located deep in the Amazon rainforest.
features: Nature Walks, Local Cuisine, River Tours
best_customer_review: Incredible experience being so close to nature.
worst_customer_review: Too many mosquitoes and no hot water.

description: Compact and stylish rooms for the modern traveler.
best_customer_review: Efficient use of space and great amenities!

description: A luxurious resort in the desert with stunning night skies.
features: Camel Rides, Desert Safari, Infinity Pool
best_customer_review: The night sky and dunes were breathtaking.
worst_customer_review: Expensive meals and limited vegetarian options.

description: A cozy inn ideal for viewing the Northern Lights.
features: Aurora Viewing Deck, Sauna, Guided Tours
best_customer_review: We saw the Northern Lights two nights in a row!
worst_customer_review: Rooms were a bit small for families.

description: Charming hotel overlooking the iconic canals.
features: Canal View Rooms, Bike Rentals, Local Art Decor
best_customer_review: Gorgeous views and close to everything.

description: Adventure lodge located near a wildlife reserve.
features: Safari Tours, Campfire Dining, Wildlife Watching
best_customer_review: Saw lions up close! The guides were excellent.
worst_customer_review: Water pressure in the showers was low.

description: Small family-run inn with ocean views and homemade breakfasts.
features: Ocean Views, Homemade Breakfast, Porch Swings
best_customer_review: Felt like home away from home!

description: A scenic resort surrounded by snow-covered peaks.
features: Ski Access, Heated Pools, Fine Dining
best_customer_review: Best ski holiday we've had, bar none!

description: Waterfront hotel offering access to the marina and sailing tours.
best_customer_review: Loved the sailing tours and fresh seafood.
worst_customer_review: The room AC unit was loud at night.

description: Peaceful lakeside lodge with paddle boats and fishing spots.
best_customer_review: Perfect for a quiet weekend away.
worst_customer_review: Wi-Fi only worked in common areas.

description: Quaint hotel in a historic building in the city center.
features: Historic Architecture, Walking Distance to Attractions, Free Breakfast
best_customer_review: Great location and very charming atmosphere.
